'''Excerpts of Bliss''' is a reward obtained from the [[Summertide Scales and Tales]] event.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|text1    = You can find many Excerpts of Bliss scattered throughout [[Simulanka]].<br>Collect [[Jubilant Feather]]s and open [[Fairytale Trove]]s to obtain these Excerpts and get other valuable items and rewards...<br>You can more easily obtain Excerpts when you have either the [[Jocund Letters|Jocund Letter]] or [[Joyous Letters|Joyous Letter]] equipped.
|image1   = Tutorial Excerpts of Bliss.png
}}
